caption.p: Three-dimensional structure of the SARS-CoV RNA-dependent RNA-polymerase (nsp12) and its palm subdomain. ( a) The RdRp subdomains are colored as follows: thumb – red; palm – green; fingers – yellow; nidovirus RdRp-associated nucleotidyl transferase (NIRAN) domain – blue; interface – cyan. ( b) The conserved structural motifs within the palm subdomain and conforming the active site are colored as follows: motif F – orange; motif A – yellow; motif B – blue; motif C – green; motif D – magenta; motif E – cyan.
